Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to use your own generative AI model from Azure AI Foundry in prompt builder. This feature has reached general availability.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, you can add your own custom models, tailored to specific business needs, directly into your Copilot agents, Power apps and Power automate flows. When using models trained on domain-specific data, you can optimize costs and use specialized models for individual tasks.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Use your own generative AI model from Azure AI Foundry in prompt builder and Bring your own model for your prompts articles.

Title: AI Builder â€“ Use your own generative AI model from Azure AI Foundry in Prompt builder in Copilot Studio.
